sector.narrative: Sanitation and hygiene - improving services in emergency communities

description.narrative: Social Protection, Land Housing and Community Amenities emergency relief

condition.narrative: Should contribute directly to results for children as outlined in the UNDAF, national results and/or UNICEF Strategic Plan and within the scope defined in the CPD, CPAP, OMP or other agreed upon programme documents

description.narrative: Over 300,000 people gained access to sanitation facilities; 10,750 (5,253 men and 5,497 women including children) were given access safe water supply and 1,340,527 (656,858 men and 683,669 women including children) people with hygiene messages in the cholera affected and flood areas. | Status:Met | As-of Date:27/12/2018
